links.cantConnect: Can't connect to the Acrolinx Server?

message.invalidServerAddress: It looks like the server address is incorrect. Check the address and try again.
message.noCloudSidebar: It looks like your server supports an older Sidebar version. We've tried to load a fallback Sidebar from the Acrolinx cloud but run into a connection problem. Check your Internet connection.
message.outdatedServer: It looks like your Acrolinx integration needs a newer server version to load the Sidebar. Ask your Acrolinx Server administrator to update your server.
message.serverConnectionProblemHttp: We couldn't connect to your Acrolinx Server. Check that the server address is correct. If you still can't connect then contact your Acrolinx Server administrator. It might be that your server doesn’t accept insecure connections.
message.serverConnectionProblemHttps: We couldn't connect to your Acrolinx Server. Check that the server address is correct. If you still can't connect then contact your Acrolinx Server administrator. It might be that your server doesn’t accept secure connections.
message.serverIsNoAcrolinxServerOrHasNoSidebar: It looks like this isn’t an Acrolinx Server or this server version doesn't support the Sidebar. Ask your server administrator to check your server version if you're sure that the server address is correct.
message.serverIsNotSecure: You need to connect to a secure server. A secure server address starts with "https".
message.loadSidebarTimeout: It looks like the Sidebar took too long to load. Check your network connection or contact your Acrolinx Server administrator.

tooltip.httpsRequired: You need to connect to a secure server. A secure server address starts with "https".
tooltip.openHelp: Open help information in a web browser window
